content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I added my favorite books to a new file called "favorite_books.txt" using Python code and confirmed that the file was written successfully. Then, I listed the files in the current directory and found the new file "favorite_books.txt". I used the 'google' command to search for information on the legal implications of using artificial intelligence in the workplace and found several relevant sources of information. I used the 'read_file' command to read the 'legal_research_resources.txt' file and found a list of legal research resources. Finally, I used the 'execute_shell' command to install the 'pandas' library using pip and confirmed that it was installed successfully.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "fun and educational websites"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.mkewithkids.com/post/10-educational-websites-that-will-actually-let-you-work-for-an-hour-or-two/", "https://www.savethechildren.org/us/charity-stories/free-websites-and-apps-to-keep-kids-learning", "https://www.verywellfamily.com/best-free-educational-websites-for-kids-3129084", "https://www.ces-schools.net/20-educational-websites-for-kids-that-are-free-and-fun/", "https://mashable.com/article/fun-websites-improve-skills", "https://www.funbrain.com/", "https://funlearningforkids.com/20-fun-learning-websites-for-kids/", "https://research.com/education/fun-and-free-educational-websites-for-kids"]', type='action_result')]
"""
